answers.answer: Asylum is a form of protection that allows a foreigner who cannot return to their country of origin to remain in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Any foreigner who left their country of origin because they fear persecution, serious human rights violations, or armed conflict can apply for asylum.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Someone might seek asylum if they fear persecution, serious human rights violations, or armed conflict in their country of origin.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Someone can apply for asylum directly at a border crossing point or, if already in Romania as a migrant, anywhere in Romania, either in writing or verbally.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Someone can apply for asylum either directly at a border crossing point or, if they have already entered Romania as a migrant, anywhere within Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Applicants must submit all available relevant documents to their personal situation, as well as the document used for crossing the state border.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Asylum seekers receive a temporary identity document for asylum seekers issued by the General Inspectorate for Immigration (IGI).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: During interviews, asylum seekers are scheduled by the IGI for a preliminary and a secondary interview to determine a form of protection, and they must attend, present evidence, and answer truthfully.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Asylum interviews are conducted in the presence of an IGI official and a translator, with translation provided in a language the applicant knows or is reasonably expected to know.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Everything said during the asylum interviews is confidential.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Asylum seekers can request the participation of a CNRR legal advisor or a UNHCR representative at the interview.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Asylum applications in Romania are normally processed within one to two months.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Through Sprijin de Urgență, one can request resources such as food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Someone can offer resources through Sprijin de Urgență by using the 'Request or provide resources' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Un Acoperiș aims to provide support in finding temporary accommodation for vulnerable people or to help people offer a space for them.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: Someone can find temporary accommodation through Un Acoperiș by accessing it and using the 'Search or offer accommodation' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: Someone can provide accommodation through Un Acoperiș by accessing it and using the 'Search or offer accommodation' option to offer a space.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/applying-for-asylum and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.
